ComicInfo.Summary:
Let's Party: Fred and Hank have no chance with the women with the Playguy Advisor at the party.
The Butthole Machine: The butthole machine breaks down
Soviets On TV: The Soviets are ridiculed by a U.S. TV host.
Women: Bob recounts his dysfunctional relationship with Sondra.
The Night Jayne Mansfield's Head Hosted the Johnny Carson Show: Jayne has a drinking contest with Ed McMahon.
The Ever-Lovin' Adventures Of Stretchpants and Beverage Bottles: Stretchpants discovers his calling in life
Christmas 1,000,000 B.C.: A caveman can't decide what to give his girlfriend for Christmas
Mental Block Party: Middle-age hypocrisy at work.
Human Garbage: Two dumb guys hang out.
Lost Lǖther: Lǖther manifests in a strange surreal place.
Dames Make the Man: How a man's profile is raised by his choice of date
I'm Grateful! I'm Grateful!: Crumb muses on the better elements of his life.
Beto and Carol in It's Not the Motion, It's the Meat: Gilbert and Carol's day.
Life in These United States: The tensions simmering between friends.
Parade of Idiots: Steven walks off his TV show.
Lifestyles of the Rich and Famous: Fifi literally trashes Steven.
Steven and Brock: Comedians: Fifi shoots Steven with a shotgun.
Diggety Dog: Steven hates his stand-up comedy gig.
